entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
